definitions.text: the reign of Charles II in England; 1660-1685
the act of restoring something or someone to a satisfactory state

examples: upon the restitution of the book to its rightful owner the child was given a tongue lashing

definitions.text: the state of being restored to its former good condition
examples: the inn was a renovation of a Colonial house

definitions.text: some artifact that has been restored or reconstructed
examples: the restoration looked exactly like the original

definitions.text: a model that represents the landscape of a former geological age or that represents and extinct animal etc.
the re-establishment of the British monarchy in 1660
